snippet: Should it have to say how much it knows about bomb design?
abstract: News Analysis; Iran has managed to effectively evade question of whether it has capability to build atom bomb for dozen years; United States and other major powers are considering whether to compel Iran to reveal depth of its knowledge about atom bomb as part of deal to curtail its nuclear program.

byline.original: By WILLIAM J. BROAD and DAVID E. SANGER

lead_paragraph: Should it have to say how much it knows about bomb design?

headline.print_headline: What Iran Won’t Say About the Bomb
headline.main: What Iran Won’t Say About the Bomb
